title: Form Magazine Germany
content:
Greetings, trying to identify these two typeface used in Form Mag. I thought it was Bauer Bodoni Italic and Akzidenz Grotesque Medium but can't be sure. A little help?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416144938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ct_form_h_6038.jpg)
author: Fostergrant

comments.content: strange how i don't really like either of those typefaces, but they work so well together...
